God, Creator
ᎤᏁᎳᏅᎯ ᎤᏪᏥ ᎢᎦᎫᏴᎮᎢ, ᎿᏊ ᏦᏒ ᏫᏳᎶᏎ ᎢᎦᎫᏴᎰᏅ. ᎠᏎᏃ ᎢᎤᏁᏤᎢ ᎢᏳᏃ ᏚᎴᏅ, “ᏔᎵᏁ ᏛᏥᎷᏥᎵ,” ᎤᏛᏁ ᎤᏁᏨ.
Unelanvhi Uwetsi igaguyvhei, hnaquu tsosv wiyulose igaguyvhonv. Aseno iunetsei iyuno dulenv, “taline dvtsilutsili,” udvne unetsv.
God his-son he-paid-it-for-us, then heaven he-went he-paid-it-all-for-us. But he-spoke-again when he-arose, "second-time I-am-going-to-return," he-said-it when-he-spoke.
